h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
h2_title: What Happens When You Collect All 4 Talismans?
content: When it's over, you can collect a Celestial Nonary Pill from the box behind the fight area and will achieve the trophy Misfit with Merit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_All_Purple_Talisman_Altars_in_Chapter_4.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4', specifically from the subsection 'What Happens When You Collect All 4 Talismans?'.
The content is as follows:
When it's over, you can collect a Celestial Nonary Pill from the box behind the fight area and will achieve the trophy Misfit with Merit.
